headline: Closing Bell Movers: Amazon soars to all-time highs on earnings
summary: In the opening hour of the evening session, U.S. equity futures are notably higher, with S&P 500 up 0.5% and Nasdaq 100 contracts up 1.0%. In commodities, WTI Crude Oil is little changed just above $60 per barrel while precious metals are stronger for the 3rd day in a row – Gold is above $4,040 and Silver is approaching $49 per ounce. A strong slate of quarterly Tech results are helping stock futures restore positive sentiment in the segment that was wounded on Thursday by more dubious results o

headline: Strong Q3 and Lowered Guidance Could Be a Game Changer for First Solar (FSLR)
summary: On October 30, 2025, First Solar reported third quarter sales of US$1.59 billion and net income of US$455.94 million, showing strong year-on-year growth, but revised its full-year sales and earnings guidance downward. This combination of robust quarterly performance alongside more cautious annual targets highlights both the company's operating momentum and management's tempered outlook for the near term. We'll explore how First Solar's strong quarterly results and lowered guidance shape its...

headline: Why Is First Solar (FSLR) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of solar panel manufacturer First Solar (NASDAQ:FSLR) jumped 12.5% in the afternoon session after the company reported mixed results for its third quarter of 2025. The company’s revenue of $1.59 billion met Wall Street's expectations, marking a significant 79.7% increase compared to the same period last year. However, its profit of $4.24 per share slightly missed the analyst consensus of $4.32. Despite the positive year-on-year growth, First Solar lowered its full-year guidance for both r

headline: Earnings Roundup: Apple, Coinbase, Reddit
summary: ↗️ Amazon (AMZN): The e-commerce company reported faster-than-expected growth in AI-related revenue and detailed aggressive plans to grow data-center capacity. Shares soared 11% Friday morning. ? Apple (AAPL): The company logged record sales and said it expects a big December quarter, as customers race to upgrade to the iPhone 17.

summary: FSLR's Q3 profit and sales surge year over year, but the solar leader trims its 2025 guidance below consensus forecasts.

headline: FSLR Q3 Deep Dive: Contract Terminations and Supply Chain Disruptions Shape Outlook
summary: Solar panel manufacturer First Solar (NASDAQ:FSLR) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 79.7% year on year to $1.59 billion. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $5.08 billion at the midpoint came in 3.8% below analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $4.24 per share was 1.9% below analysts’ consensus estimates.
